mapper.update: update device_edges_item set deleted = 1 where edge_product_type_id = #{productTypeId}
mapper.select: SELECT pro.id AS `value`,pro.label AS label FROM device_abutment abu LEFT JOIN device_product_type pro ON pro.id = abu.product_id WHERE abu.device_type = 2 AND abu.edge_id IS NOT NULL

select dei.*,dpt.label AS edgeProductTypeName from device_edges_item dei LEFT JOIN device_product_type dpt ON dei.edge_product_type_id = dpt.id where dei.deleted = 0
and dei.edge_name like concat('%',#{model.name},'%')
order by dei.creator_name DESC
